item.title: Foot Sling Plantar Fasciitis Nonskid Pad On Bottom Of Splint & Universal Size Fits Left Or Right
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The AT 388 LACE ANKLE SUPPORT has been designed and manufactured by AT Surgical specifically to treat and provide rapid relief to weak ankles and…

The post Foot Sling Plantar Fasciitis Nonskid Pad On Bottom Of Splint & Universal Size Fits Left Or Right appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
The AT 388 LACE ANKLE SUPPORT has been designed and manufactured by AT Surgical specifically to treat and provide rapid relief to weak ankles and sprained ankles.
The Lace ankle support is perfect fit for use while playing basketball, running, soccer, volleyball ,football or any other sport. It is also ideal for post sports related injuries.

This ankle support product has plenty of lace to fit all sizes . This is the most stable and adjustable one, offering the best coverage ,also makes it the most comfortable, whether wearing it with shoes or not .

It locks your foot into position so you can walk without fear of further injury .

Features:

  • FIGURE 8 STRAP DESIGN: LACE ANKLE SUPPORT not only lace up nice and tight but the figure 8 strap design really stabilizes from rolling .
  • DISTINCTIVE DESIGN : Designed as a canvas construction by the professionals of AT Surgical.
  • DURABLE : To ensure it is durable, yet comfortable, providing stronger full around the ankle support and stability.
  • FULLY ADJUSTABLE :There is plenty of lace in order to fit all sizes .
  • STRONG LACES: The laces are strong enough to support for ultimate compression.
  • BILATERAL FIT: Our dynamic ankle supports are bilateral, meaning they can fit both your left and right foot.
  • Superior Quality : The product is MADE IN AMERICA, consulting professionals by AT Surgical, which means it ensures and abides by the supreme quality fit for patients’ rapid pain relief.

    • Specification:

  • Item Type: Ankle Brace
  • Style: LACE Ankle Brace
  • Gender: Men/Women

    • Size

  • Sizes Available
  • (1 ) One SIZE Fits All
  • (2) Fits BOTH, LEFT or RIGHT Foot

    • The post Foot Sling Plantar Fasciitis Nonskid Pad On Bottom Of Splint & Universal Size Fits Left Or Right appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Air Gel Ankle Brace-best For Ankle Sprain, Heel Pain, Foot Fatigue, Fits Left Or Right Foot
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The A-T-02 AT® AIR GEL ANKLE BRACE has been designed to stabilize ankle and heel so that injury is prevented. It aids as a tool…

The post Air Gel Ankle Brace-best For Ankle Sprain, Heel Pain, Foot Fatigue, Fits Left Or Right Foot appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
The A-T-02 AT® AIR GEL ANKLE BRACE has been designed to stabilize ankle and heel so that injury is prevented. It aids as a tool to prevent injury and treat pain and inflammation related to high impact running, training and sporting. Compression provides soothing heat while promoting circulation for healing and the reduction of inflammation. Orthopedic immobilization limits excessive movement to prevent injury of lateral and medial collateral ligaments.

It is made with superior craftsmanship and examined by the highest standards in the industry to prevent irritation while ensuring proper placement with a snug, comfortable fit.

It supports weak ankles and heels for everyday aches and pains, weight training and sports. For the treatment and prevention of minor strains and sprains, arthritis, weak ankles and heels, muscle fatigue and more.

So, it is recommended by professionals to USE The A-T-02 AT® AIR GEL ANKLE BRACE to protect ankles, heels, Achilles’ tendon and ligaments.

Features:

  • Designed For Comfort: Designed and manufactured to prevent sprains, strains and other injuries while maximizing comfort.
  • Provides Added Stabilization and Support : This ankle brace have adjustable cross tension straps for added stabilization and support.
  • Unique design for full ankle support: It is uniquely designed to prevent sprains, strains and other injuries covering the patients’ full ankle.
  • Chamber filled with air and gel:. Air insert includes air tube to adjust for optimal fit and compression. Gel insert can be removed and chilled for cold therapy.
  • Use with your shoes on : This gives you the independence to wear your shoes as it has an open foot design that makes it breathable and comfortable.
  • Use for both Cold and Hot therapies : Can be used for both Cold/Hot therapies for prevention of ankle pain.Gel insert can be removed and chilled for cold therapy or microwaved for hot therapy.
  • Recommended by Professionals : ANKLE BRACEs are recommended for the treatment of pain related to sprains, strains, arthritis and excessive muscle joint movement, inflammation and injury in ankle ligaments.

Specification:

  • Item Type: Ankle Brace
  • Style: Air Gel Ankle Brace
  • Gender: Men/Women

    • Size

  • Size Available
  • One Size Fits All

    • The post Air Gel Ankle Brace-best For Ankle Sprain, Heel Pain, Foot Fatigue, Fits Left Or Right Foot appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Latex Free Thumb Spica Brace for Carpal Tunnel Syndrome & Injury
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The Latex Free Thumb Spica Brace for Carpal Tunnel Syndrome & Injury provides secure and comfortable support of the wrist. This model features a design that assists in the immobilization of the thumb, which helps to minimize pain and prevent further trauma to the injured joint.

Additionally, wearing a wrap or brace increases surface skin and subcutaneous temperature, making tendons and muscles more pliable and elastic to provide optimal muscle function.

The post Latex Free Thumb Spica Brace for Carpal Tunnel Syndrome & Injury appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• 2 Velcro® locking straps
  • 8″ in length
  • Provides protection and support for treating Carpal Tunnel Syndrome
  • Metal thumb splint
  • One size fits most
  • Latex free

The post Latex Free Thumb Spica Brace for Carpal Tunnel Syndrome & Injury appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Cradle Arm Sling Shoulder Immobilizer with Foam Swathe
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Made with a 1" wide adjustable strap and Velcro closures. The Cradle Arm Sling Shoulder Immobilizer with Foam Swath helps distribute weight to the shoulder and back and provides relief and protection while you're recuperating and healing from an arm or hand fracture, sprain or surgery

item.content:encoded:
• The Cradle Arm Sling Shoulder Immobilizer with Foam Swath provides relief and protection while you’re recuperating and healing from an arm or hand fracture, sprain or surgery
  • Made with a 1″ wide adjustable strap and Velcro closures
  • The Cradle Arm Sling Shoulder Immobilizer with Foam Swath helps distribute weight to the shoulder and back
  • Reversible for the right or left arm
  • Shoulder immobilizer with foam swathe prevents further injury during recuperation
  • One size – adjustable

item.title: Philadelphia Collar-lightweight Foam Plastic & Flexible Collar,Manage Pain Neck, Small Size, 10 -12”
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The AT 6004 ,Philadelphia Collars, are an innovative cervical collar,with high-quality materials that provide an unparalleled combination of immobilization and patient comfort. The lightweight ,…

The post Philadelphia Collar-lightweight Foam Plastic & Flexible Collar,Manage Pain Neck, Small Size, 10 -12” appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
The AT 6004 ,Philadelphia Collars, are an innovative cervical collar,with high-quality materials that provide an unparalleled combination of immobilization and patient comfort.
The lightweight , foam plastic design is as such that it is molded and shaped to conform and provide comfort to any patient. It has perforated holes for ventilation and plastic that is rigid to support neck.
The AT 6004 ,Philadelphia Collar, not only offers excellent immobilization and comfort but also enables healthcare professionals to quickly perform carotid pulse monitoring and emergency tracheostomies.

Features:

  • Perforated holes for ventilation : The AT 6004 ,Philadelphia Collars are equipped with the unique Perforated holes that aid comfort to patients as it allows ventilation. It also help healthcare professionals to rapidly perform carotid pulse monitoring and emergency tracheostomies while providing cervical immobilization
  • Lightweight : The AT 6004 ,Philadelphia Collar is designed with a combination of foam and plastic to let it be easy, light and comfortable for the patient to carry around.
  • Rigid plastic to support neck : The AT 6004 ,Philadelphia Collars, have rigid plastic so that the cervical spine flexion extension is restricted and also allow rotation to promote patient recovery.
  • Molded and shaped to conform to any patient : At AT Surgical we make sure that every Philadelphia Collars we manufacture, truly reflects and demonstrates our commitment to the patient’s compliance and rapid recovery through unbiased superiority in the form of immobilization and ultimate comfort.

    • Size

  • Size Available
  • NECK SIZE = COLLAR SIZE
  • 10 -12” =SMALL

    • The post Philadelphia Collar-lightweight Foam Plastic & Flexible Collar,Manage Pain Neck, Small Size, 10 -12” appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Elbow Immobilizer
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
This elbow splint prevents elbow flexion, while allowing some arm movement. It can be used for your right or left arm. Velcro makes it adjustable, while metal stays can be bent to fit the exact angle of bend recommended by your doctor.

  • Velcro tabs assure snug fit
  • Removable pre-shaped stays
  • Foam-lined with nylon shell
  • Washable - do not use bleach

The post Elbow Immobilizer appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
Indications

Cleft Palate and IV Therapy
Ulnar Nerve Entrapment
Elbow Fractures
Postoperative Use
Elbow Night Splint

The post Elbow Immobilizer appeared first on AT Surgical.
